04000000 01737548 00000000
580A0000 04C91A78
580A1000 00000220
540A1000 000007A8
A4A00400 0173754C
20000000

[Encounter pokemon that u have seen in pokedex. Go to your pokedex and press a to see that pokemon. Than press R and go into the wild.]

[This would be a nice trick when we have pkhex and you can set your pokedex open. or unlock the complete pokedex with a asm cheat.]
